title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 454.12 - Modification or merger of rates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 454.12 - Modification or merger of rates

State Regulations

The rates provided for in each service tariff or other
contract documents shall be subject to modification from time to time by the
authority pursuant to the provisions of the Power Authority Act or any other
applicable statutes. The authority may merge rates for power and energy made
available from some or all of its facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
454.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
